channel.title: Introduction on MATEwiki
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on MATEwiki

item.title: Installation
item.description: This page describes how to install the MATE Desktop Environment. Preinstalled Linux BSD Illumos Manual installation Preinstalled We recommend to use a distribution that already comes with the MATE Desktop pre-installed, such as (but not limited to): Linux Fedora MATE-Compiz Spin Ubuntu MATE Linux Mint - MATE Debian: In the net-install installer choose the “Mate Desktop Environment” option.

item.title: Contributing
item.description: This page describes how to contribute to the MATE Desktop Environment. Welcome Contact IRC Welcome Hi! We are the MATE Desktop Team and we are glad you found your way to this page. We always need new people who want to help. Help can be done in many several ways and everyone can help in one way or another.
